Package org.apache.juneau.rest.vars

Class ServletInitParamVar

java.lang.Object
org.apache.juneau.svl.Var
org.apache.juneau.svl.SimpleVar
org.apache.juneau.svl.DefaultingVar
org.apache.juneau.rest.vars.ServletInitParamVar
public class ServletInitParamVar extends DefaultingVar
Servlet init parameter variable resolver.

The format for this var is "$I{key[,defaultValue]}".

This variable resolver requires that a RestRequest bean be available in the session bean store.

Values are pulled from the GenericServlet.getInitParameter(String) method.

Since this is a SimpleVar, any variables contained in the result will be recursively resolved. Likewise, if the arguments contain any variables, those will be resolved before they are passed to this var.

See Also:
  • SVL Variables
